orig_text: Solutions will need to chose between flexibility (supporting multiple options) and conciseness (selection of specific options in order to simplify implementation and deployment).
correct_text: Solutions will need to choose between flexibility (supporting multiple options) and conciseness (selection of specific options in order to simplify implementation and deployment).
notes: In this sentence, "choose" is the correct verb to use because it means to select or make a decision between two or more alternatives. "Chose" is the past tense of "choose," so it would not be correct to use in this context.

orig_text: Remove Quic 128 key connection and replace with 256 key algorithm security keys. I've been illegally hacked after my Asus, Lenovo, and HP14 windows laptops were stolen by my thieving mother Laura Denton(207 Lillian Dr, Sikeston, MO 63801, itsmelsd@charter.net, itsmelsd@spectrum.net, itsmelsd@icloud.com, itsmelsd@gmail.com), and her buddies Robert Arnold formerly of Chaffee, MO. now I believe lives in Scott City, MO. & Amanda Downing of 530 Vernon Street, Sikeston, MO. 63801. They illegally stole my security keys to my laptops as well as the security keys for my iPhones 7, 11, 13 mini, 2 iPhone 14 pro max's 256 gb, about 25 other go phones from Samsung Galaxy A-10, A-11, A-12, A-13, A-14, A-15, Motorola Note, T-mobile revvl 6 x 5g, so many I can't honestly remember all of them off the top of my head but ive filed police reports w/ officers Lane & Rodriguez of the Sikeston department of public safety in regards to the thefts and crime's, as I honestly don't know exactly what all they've done but I do know they illegally ported my iPhone 13 mini and have illegally placed root Chrome & Microsoft Security Certificates on my network and devices, and have changed other security settings some internal, some hardware, some software, they've illegally stolen everything from the drives, hardware, software, processors, storage, all of my files, memory, my email addresses associated with each laptop/ Microsoft account/;etc. I need it all fixed and I need all of the information given to the officers at Sikeston Department of Public Safety to press charges on all of the responsible parties involved. I am not tech savvy at all and I have no idea what the heck to do but they have got illegal web servers connected to my tmobile internet from itsmelsd@charter.net, itsmelsd@spectrum.net and i need it removed immediately! Please help fix this as well as remove the beavis573.com cloud flare connection as well. Thank you to whom it concerns.
